playGame: Play games to rise your power

pcInfo.temporaryPower: The power you get from winning games is temporary, and every game has its own decay timer of 24 hours.
pcInfo.cooldown: The cooldown of a game increases with the rise of the game difficulty.
pcInfo.externalSoftware: The usage of any external software, scripts and services in RollerCoin will lead to a permanent ban of the account and freeze of the account balance.

winning.title: By winning games, you have a chance to receive one of the following items:
winning.text1: x2 Power time hold from the game
winning.text3: x2 Power reward from the game

play.powerRemain: Power will remain valid for next
play.powerWhenYouWin: Mining Power is added only when you win the game.

captcha.enterCaptchaTitle: To start a game, solve the
captcha.limit: The suspicious activity detected. Please wait and try again later.
